Title: What Grows in the Dark
Description:
We are told never to walk in the darkness. To carry light wherever we go. The thought of returning this way filled me with dread. 

But your courage shines with splendor, $n. At your side, my way is lit.

No more hiding. The beast clad in black chitin, the one that killed my friends, dies in that cave. I am with you.
PortraitGiverText: A foul parasite permitted too long to grow strong in the dark.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Captain Trueflame at Dunelle's Kindness.
RewardText:
Wayshelm told me everything.

A debt of gratitude is owed. To you, and to the scouts who gave their life for our empire.
